The Complete History of the Mystery

A Survey of the Development of Mystery Genre Form Throughout History

by R. Cook

From the earliest versions of the mystery story through the modern age, the mystery story has evolved from simple riddles to complex plots involving a myriad of detective types, plot devices and styles. What was once merely a puzzle, has evolved into a full-blown literary style and remains one of the most popular forms of fiction.
